src:
Krko morajo preplavati
02 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Sandi Jerman

Rokometaši RD Butan plin Izola danes v izjemno pomembnem obračunu spodnjega dela lestvice gostijo novomeško Krko. Dolenjci so doslej zbrali le točko več od Izolanov, a se med petimi novembrskimi nasprotniki modro-belih zdijo še najlažje premagljivi.



Trener Fredi Radojkovič (v sredini) s svojimi varovanci pričakuje težko tekmo, a tudi zmago. Foto: Zdravko Primožič/FPA

IZOLA > Izolski rokometaši, ki so v prvih sedmih tekmah domače ligaške sezone zbrali le tri točke, so v november stopili z nehvaležnega zadnjega mesta letvice. Vendar pa si lahko položaj zelo hitro izboljšajo, saj je trenutno peto Gorenje osvojilo le šest točk. Kar osem prvoligašev se na prvenstveni razpredelnici gnete v pičlih treh točkah razlike.
Za varovance trenerja Fredija Radojkoviča na tekmi proti Novomeščanom šteje le zmaga, saj le ta prinaša skok po lestvici. Obenem bi morebitna zmaga vsem izolskim igralcem zagotovila potrebno infuzijo samozavesti pred naslednjimi nastopi. Po drevišnjem obračunu s Krko namreč v novembru Izolane čakajo še tekme z Mariborom, Gorenjem, Koprom in Celjem. Le z Velenjčani bodo izolski rokometaši igrali doma, ostale tri tekme pa v gosteh. Zato je današnja tekma proti Krki še toliko pomembnejša, saj bo pot do točk na ostalih novembrskih srečanjih najbrž težja.
“V našem taboru smo imeli med zadnjim premorom nekaj zdravstvenih težav, a bo proti Krki manjkal le Amel Redžić. Ni kaj, tokrat moramo zmagat. Na to tekmo smo se pripravljali tako, da smo bolj kot igro Krke dobro analizirali svojo igro. Največji nasprotnik smo si namreč kar mi sami, zato bi radi odpravili čim več lastnih napak. Moramo pa ostati zbrani vseh 60 minut tekme. Tudi v obdobjih, ko nam ne gre, nam nikakor ne sme pasti koncentracija,” je pred tekmo z Novomeščani povedal trener izolske članske vrste.
Krka je doslej zmagala dvakrat. V prvem krogu je doma ugnala mariborski Branik s 27:25, sredi oktobra pa je slavila na gostovanju v Slovenj Gradcu z 31:23. Prvi strelec dolenjske ekipe je srednji zunanji igralec Andraž Kette, ki je doslej zabil 43 golov, enajst iz sedemmetrovk. Zdi se, da igra Krka v napadu malce več prek obeh kril ter da obenem nima kakovostnih strelcev z obeh branilskih položajev. “Gre za tipično prvoligaško ekipo, ki nima izrazitih strelcev z zunanjih položajev, zato poskuša nenehno napraviti viške igralcev in velikokrat napade zaključuje prek kril,” se je strinjal Radojkovič.
text:
They have to swim across the river
02 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Sandi Jerman

Today, the butlers of the RD Bhutan gas Izola host the Krka in Novo mesto in the extremely important calculation of the bottom of the scale. The Dolenjska have so far collected only a point more than the Izolans, but among the five opponents of November, the blue and white appear to be the most easily overcome.



Coach Fredi Radojkovic (center) with his guards is expecting a tough game but also a win. Photo: Zdravko Primozic / FPA

IZOLA> Izola wrestlers, who scored just three points in the first seven games of the domestic league season, stepped down from the ungrateful backstroke in November. However, they can improve the situation very quickly, as the current Gorenje fifth has won only six points. As many as eight first-team players are chasing three points of difference on the championship standings.
Coach Freddie Radojkovich is only considered a winner in the match against Novomestani, as he brings the jump up the ladder. At the same time, a possible victory would give all Isol players the necessary infusion of confidence before the next appearances. After an ancient showdown with Krka, in November Izolana will have matches with Maribor, Gorenje, Koper and Celje. Only the men from Velenje will play Izola wrestlers at home, while the other three games will be away. That is why today's match against Krka is all the more important, as the road to the points in the other November meetings will probably be more difficult.
“We had some health issues in our camp during the last break, but only Amel Redzic will be missing against Krka. No, we have to win this time. We were preparing for this match by analyzing our game more than Krka's. Namely, our biggest opponent is ourselves, so we want to eliminate as many of our own mistakes as possible. We must, however, stay clear for all 60 minutes of the match. Even in the periods when we are out of focus, we should not fall in concentration at all, ”the coach of the Isola member series said before the match with Novomestani.
Krka has won twice so far. In the first round, she chased home Maribor's Branik with 27:25, and in mid-October she celebrated her visit to Slovenj Gradec with 31:23. Dolenjska's first goal scorer is midfielder Andraz Kette, who has scored 43 goals so far, eleven from seven. It seems that Krka's attack on the wings was a bit much for both wings and at the same time there were no quality shooters from both positions. "This is a typical first-team squad that does not have pronounced shooters from outside positions, so it constantly tries to make high players, and often ends up attacking through the wings," agreed Radojkovic.
